snippet.title: Banjo-Kazooie Returns - (Full Custom Mod) Trailer #7
snippet.description:
Join the BKR Discord | https://discord.gg/pAfbjB2

The latest trailer for Banjo-Kazooie Returns, a fan-made rom hack I've been working on for over five years. If you like what you see, join me every week as I live stream my progress right here on this channel!

This trailer is actually an updated version of the trailer I submitted (but never uploaded) to Kaze's F3 Presentation.

Music in this trailer was created by Badub, make sure to check out his other custom BK music here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ZdpOhL2oFU

-----

Some frequently asked questions:

Q: When will the game be released?
A: I work on the game when I have the time, I have other priorities before BKR. So I can't even give a rough estimate - don't expect it any time soon!

Q: When will you release a demo?
A: I already have! You can check it out here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1T61vu6l5mI

Q: Why isn't this more like Banjo Tooie?
A: The game runs on the Banjo-Kazooie engine. Banjo's Backpack, the level editor I use, is only compatible with this game.

Q: Can I help with music?
A: I work on this project alone, but I will need someone to help with music in the future. BUT, I'd like to look for help in the music department when I'm comfortable with the amount of work I have done. Please don't contact me just yet, I'm not ready to start looking!

Q: Will this run on the original Nintendo 64?
A: Hopefully! But this is not my goal so I will not be optimizing the game to run on the original hardware.
